[ 0:00]

[ 0:01]   Volume group "@PREFIX@vg" successfully created
[ 0:01] 
[ 0:01] # RAID 4/5/6 (can replace up to 'parity' devices)
[ 0:01] for i in 4 5 6; do
[ 0:01] 	lvcreate --type raid$i -i 3 -l 3 -n $lv1 $vg
[ 0:01] 
[ 0:01] 	if [ $i -eq 6 ]; then
[ 0:01] 		dev_cnt=5
[ 0:01] 		limit=2
[ 0:01] 	else
[ 0:01] 		dev_cnt=4
[ 0:01] 		limit=1
[ 0:01] 	fi
[ 0:01] 
[ 0:01] 	for j in {1..3}; do
[ 0:01] 	for o in $(seq 0 $i); do
[ 0:01] 		replace=""
[ 0:01] 
[ 0:01] 		devices=( $(get_image_pvs $vg $lv1) )
[ 0:01] 
[ 0:01] 		for k in $(seq $j); do
[ 0:01] 			index=$((($k + $o) % $dev_cnt))
[ 0:01] 			replace="$replace --replace ${devices[$index]}"
[ 0:01] 		done
[ 0:01] 		aux wait_for_sync $vg $lv1
[ 0:01] 
[ 0:01] 		if [ $j -gt $limit ]; then
[ 0:01] 			not lvconvert $replace $vg/$lv1
[ 0:01] 		else
[ 0:01] 			lvconvert $replace $vg/$lv1
[ 0:01] 		fi
[ 0:01] 	done
[ 0:01] 	done
[ 0:01] 
[ 0:01] 	lvremove -ff $vg
[ 0:01] done
[ 0:01] #lvconvert-raid456.sh:34+ for i in 4 5 6
[ 0:01] #lvconvert-raid456.sh:35+ lvcreate --type raid4 -i 3 -l 3 -n LV1 @PREFIX@vg

[ 0:11] <======== Script file "lvconvert-raid456.sh" ========>
[ 0:11] ## Line: 1 	 #!/bin/sh
[ 0:11] ## Line: 2 	 # Copyright (C) 2013-2014 Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.
[ 0:11] ## Line: 3 	 #
[ 0:11] ## Line: 4 	 # This copyrighted material is made available to anyone wishing to use,

[ 0:11] ## Line: 9 	 # along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
[ 0:11] ## Line: 10 	 # Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA  02111-1307  USA
[ 0:11] ## Line: 11 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 12 	 SKIP_WITH_LVMPOLLD=1
[ 0:11] ## Line: 13 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 14 	 . lib/inittest
[ 0:11] ## Line: 15 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 16 	 get_image_pvs() {
[ 0:11] ## Line: 17 	 	local d
[ 0:11] ## Line: 18 	 	local images
[ 0:11] ## Line: 19 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 20 	 	images=`dmsetup ls | grep ${1}-${2}_.image_.* | cut -f1 | sed -e s:-:/:`
[ 0:11] ## Line: 21 	 	lvs --noheadings -a -o devices $images | sed s/\(.\)//
[ 0:11] ## Line: 22 	 }
[ 0:11] ## Line: 23 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 24 	 ########################################################
[ 0:11] ## Line: 25 	 # MAIN
[ 0:11] ## Line: 26 	 ########################################################
[ 0:11] ## Line: 27 	 aux raid456_replace_works || skip
[ 0:11] ## Line: 28 	 aux have_raid 1 3 0 || skip
[ 0:11] ## Line: 29 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 30 	 aux prepare_pvs 7  # 7 devices for 2 dev replacement of 5-dev RAID6
[ 0:11] ## Line: 31 	 vgcreate -s 256k $vg $(cat DEVICES)
[ 0:11] ## Line: 32 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 33 	 # RAID 4/5/6 (can replace up to 'parity' devices)
[ 0:11] ## Line: 34 	 for i in 4 5 6; do
[ 0:11] ## Line: 35 	 	lvcreate --type raid$i -i 3 -l 3 -n $lv1 $vg
[ 0:11] ## Line: 36 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 37 	 	if [ $i -eq 6 ]; then
[ 0:11] ## Line: 38 	 		dev_cnt=5
[ 0:11] ## Line: 39 	 		limit=2
[ 0:11] ## Line: 40 	 	else
[ 0:11] ## Line: 41 	 		dev_cnt=4
[ 0:11] ## Line: 42 	 		limit=1
[ 0:11] ## Line: 43 	 	fi
[ 0:11] ## Line: 44 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 45 	 	for j in {1..3}; do
[ 0:11] ## Line: 46 	 	for o in $(seq 0 $i); do
[ 0:11] ## Line: 47 	 		replace=""
[ 0:11] ## Line: 48 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 49 	 		devices=( $(get_image_pvs $vg $lv1) )
[ 0:11] ## Line: 50 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 51 	 		for k in $(seq $j); do
[ 0:11] ## Line: 52 	 			index=$((($k + $o) % $dev_cnt))
[ 0:11] ## Line: 53 	 			replace="$replace --replace ${devices[$index]}"
[ 0:11] ## Line: 54 	 		done
[ 0:11] ## Line: 55 	 		aux wait_for_sync $vg $lv1
[ 0:11] ## Line: 56 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 57 	 		if [ $j -gt $limit ]; then
[ 0:11] ## Line: 58 	 			not lvconvert $replace $vg/$lv1
[ 0:11] ## Line: 59 	 		else
[ 0:11] ## Line: 60 	 			lvconvert $replace $vg/$lv1
[ 0:11] ## Line: 61 	 		fi
[ 0:11] ## Line: 62 	 	done
[ 0:11] ## Line: 63 	 	done
[ 0:11] ## Line: 64 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 65 	 	lvremove -ff $vg
[ 0:11] ## Line: 66 	 done
[ 0:11] ## Line: 67 	 
[ 0:11] ## Line: 68 	 vgremove -ff $vg
[ 0:11] aux teardown
[ 0:11] #lvconvert-raid456.sh:1+ aux teardown
[ 0:11] ## teardown...I: lvmetad waiting for client threads to finish
